actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-883.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 3377 to authorize the Wichita Indian Tribe of Oklahoma, and its affiliated bands and groups of Indians, to file with the Indian Claims Commission any of their claims against the United States for lands taken without adequate compensation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3377 (Claims by Wichita Indian Tribe).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 3377 to authorize the Wichita Indian Tribe of Oklahoma, and its affiliated bands and groups of Indians, to file with the Indian Claims Commission any of their claims against the United States for lands taken without adequate compensation, and for other purposes.
